title: Bannon predicts there will be an ideological 'fight every day' - The Washington Post
text: Bannon predicts there will be an ideological 'fight every day' Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - White House chief strategist Stephen K. Bannon and White House chief of staff Reince Priebus spoke at the Conservative Political Action Conference, Feb. 23. Bannon said the media is "adamantly opposed to" the president's agenda.
